DOC.brief_summary: research topic : helios After registration clinical research bidder : kinhely bio-tech Co.Ltd study design : A prospective single treatment group multicenter clinical study Number patient : Included subject 800 case Main research purpose : Evaluation safety effectiveness Mainly study finish:1 year target lesion failure Inclusion criterion : one : Gender limit age 18 80 two : myocardial ischemia angina symptom coronary artery disease three : A narrow less 50 % treat stent four : Comply instruction five : Voluntarily sign informed consent form exclusion criterion : one : Pregnant woman two : cardiac shock three : Against suppository medicine allergy four : Participated test research first 6 month five : Within 6 month PCI plan accept non cardiac surgery six : Non-compliant patient Follow-up time : A month 6 month 9 month 1 year 2 year follow-up progress plan : All center within 6 month start complete group
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective Multicenter Trial Evaluating Helios Biodegradable Polymer SES Safety Effectiveness CAD Treatment
DOC.criteria: Any age 18 80 sex Myocardial ischemia angina pectoris coronary artery disease An application stent diameter stenosis great 50 % Comply instruction Voluntarily sign informed consent form Pregnant woman cardiac shock Intolerance antithrombotic therapy allergy 6 month prior start study involve study Within 6 month PCI plan accept non cardiac surgery Noncompliant patient
